short_summary: Procurement notice for the maintenance and operation of the Nuans System
description: In operation since 1977, the Nuans System is used to compare a proposed corporate name or trademark with existing corporate names or trademarks to reduce confusion in the marketplace. The system provides automated search, inquiry, and reservation services for existing and proposed names, and generates a report of similar names, trademarks, and marks.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
================================

### Tender Announcement: NUANS

#### Description

The Government of Canada invites contractors to submit proposals for the provision of the Nuans System, a critical component of the corporate incorporation process in Canada. The Nuans System is used for the search, comparison, and verification of corporate names and trademarks to prevent confusion in the marketplace.

#### Background

The Nuans System has been in operation since 1977 and serves as a centralized database for corporate law administrators in all provinces, territories, and the federal government. It contains over 18 million registered corporate, business, and trademark names. The system provides automated search and inquiry services for existing and proposed names, generating reports on similarities in sound, meaning, and appearance.

#### Contract Details

*   Contract Reference Number: WS4151891565-Doc4153320995
*   Solicitation Number: WS4151891565
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-17T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-31
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2030-03-31
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada

#### Technical Specifications

The successful contractor will be required to provide:

1.  Nuans System software and database management services.
2.  Automated search, inquiry, and reservation services.
3.  Maintenance and updates of the Nuans System databases.
4.  Access to the aggregate Nuans Database.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating determining the preferred bidder.

#### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements.

#### Contact Information

For more information, contact Michael Beaudoin at [michael.beaudoin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.beaudoin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the discovery webpage at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17205590?extsite=MTcyMDU1OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17205590?extsite=MTcyMDU1OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
